content.detailedDescription: I awoke from sleep at 4am and went to the sofa. while i was checking email i noticed a vibrant sparkling/pulsating/flashing light in the window above my front door - facing north. as i walked towards the door/window i didn't see it and thought it was gone but as i backed up it came into view again so it was fairly high. i went to a different window in the house and saw it still, pulsating and every so often it would appear to have a ring. next i got the binoculars and couldn't believe what i saw. it was very far, i could see red, white, blue and green flashing lights and at times i could see a small disc shaped object. i say small because i needed the binoculars to be sure. in addition, it seemed to have a couple small - tiny small - lights come out of it. at this time i awoke my husband to have proof. he observed the same details as me and returned to bed. during this time the object started in the center of the window above my front door, moved slightly to the left and ended up to the right which told me i was not seeing a planet or star. in addition, it was a beautiful star filled sky. the stars were very bright, none were pulsating but this and it was very near the big dipper. i tried to take pictures with my iphone but they look like a white dot. so i attempted to take them with my canon 40d with a high aperture and no flash but they aren't good because the object was so far away it appears solid white. i was not able to capture the flashing/twinkling/sparkly lights. i can however see a red, green, and white, dot of light around the perimeter of the main object. notice in the 3 pictures the location of the red, blue and white lights in perspective to the main object are different in each image. the main object remained unmoved until around first light when you could still see the stars but it was gone. i didn't see it leave. my daughter woke up and we didn't want her to be afraid.
content.summary: Pulsating/flashing multiple lights on an object in the northern sky

content.detailedDescription: Not here
content.summary: Touched and examined

content.detailedDescription: I went salmon fishing on lake michigan at the michigan city light house at 5 a.M on 9/3. i noticed at 5;15 as i was casting north and looking north west at downtown chicago when i noticed a bright star take off and fly from west to east over the lake,flying real fast then slow down then rael fast then flew east to west then headed up the chicago coast north then headed back out to the lake east and up untill it dissapeared.A few minites later there it was again,this bright star stationary,then it flew from west to east at a 40% angle till it hit the water and it was gone again. a few minites went by and there it was again.This time i saw two of then flying in the same direction. one, i could see well,the other was a  mile or so from the other and you could barly see the second one.This went on for 24 minites. the next morning 9/4,i got out there to fish,instead i sat at the pinic tables and looked over the water and saw the same thing but this time they were further out in the middle of the lake and you could barly see them.I will try tonite and see what happens.I go fishing a lot in the dark and, am quite familar with all the nite skys lights, and this is the second sighting i have had over lake michigan in 45 years.These on 9/3 and 9/4 were orbs.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: The past two mornings two balls of light were flying over lake michigan like a dragon fly would fly between 5;15am till 5;45

content.detailedDescription:
Dear mufon:

the document included here are excerpts of the email(s) sent to a friend in
bc canada. i am a federal computer specialist and have been in the public/private sector industry for no less that 45 years - credentials applied.


your really going to think i'm nuts on this one but, i trust in telling you because - i know you will think i'm nuts already ha���
anyway, last sunday night - i stepped on to the back porch around 8:pm to get a breather, fresh air. sitting there enjoying my peace, two glaring lights lit up the clouds and i thought - cool - a 747 coming in to land a logan international boston. however, the lights got brighter making random motions in the sky and much too large
to be any sort of aircraft (well a thought for the moment) but, within seconds, the entire fields in back were lit up as though spotlights had blasted on. also, two huge objects appeared in the sky equal distance apart and stationary. just kind of stayed there.
well, being a former pilot, i know aircraft and i also know how the eyes can play tricks on anyone watching planes at night, helicopters, flares etc. but, these two objects were huge - just stayed there - not moving - lighting up the whole area.
my first thought - if these are 747's - their on a parallel "approach course" to logan and not good. next, if they were landing lights on (2) 747's they do not rotate and flicker - they're constant. to, know commercial aircraft enter a flight pattern over rowley
as directed by "air control" maintaining a certain altitude and compass heading guiding them to the airport. last, generally the altitude is such that there not too low should an emergency occur for evasive landing or what we call "go around".
yet, there sat these huge objects with rotating yellow lights underneath lighting up the entire sky with bright white. making matters more interesting - the entire back porch was lit up as though i was under a spotlight - focused on me. it was the weirdest thing to have happen however, here it was - yup - these are ufo's
not to sound foolish but, i ran in and got my camera and camcorder and tried to get as much photos as i could. the camcorder played tricks and worse yet, the two huge objects shot out of the sky straight up - you could see the glare coming from the clouds.
then, only one appeared and stayed in position - bright lights. ten more objects appeared and focused on the fields but, much smaller.
monday night, i went to the back porch again (heck this was getting interesting - were they spotlighting me ha') but, only one appeared -huge- lighting up the shy
and very random movements. it climbed approx. 1000' over the house across the street, which gave me some sort of dimension. shot to the sky then a bright orange
orb appeared moving all over the houses, spot lighting the fields, in such a erratic pattern that i was trying to keep the camcorder on it. then, the bright orange orb appeared
again dispersing about 10-17 smaller orbs which within 2-4 seconds had made a complete sweep of the area. then all shot up rejoining the larger orange orb, the orb shot up,
rejoining the larger craft. the sky lit up a bright white and gone. i was amazed.
here's the best part - i have it on video. the camcorder picked up the huge orange orb hovering over the houses, fields etc. - at almost road level. 
the video is too large to attach. (44 mg) lets see what i can do.
pictures coming of what i saw???


i know this is a bit strange but, seeing these objects was amazing
and more curious. you know - we hear of ufo's and there's much debate 
as to they're existence and being a computer guy and engineer - well - i
have my doubts about a lot however, this is the first time that i saw something
up hand which more than incredible. you might see one i suppose and not knowing what
it is - well - it becomes a ufo however - when the whole "freaking" family shows up - you have to wonder.
there are too many scientists, people of knowledge that have presented evidence but, then again you say - we ain't caught one yet?? to that they say - yes we have. where do you go with it and is there substance.
from what i saw - i'm a believer now.
i'm going to pass one more thought to you - my last "encounter" if you will was monday evening and i tried to get pictures as well.
one tuesday morning i was whipped and - i crawled to the bed and made it down
quickly (as you know i just got out of the hospital) when i awoke - i couldn't get my bearings - the bed was not under me. i was on my back on the bedroom floor facing the kitchen, the trash bucket turned over. i figured i'd take care of it later and made my way to the bed once again.
as i lay, there was dripping coming from my mouth and i knew i must have taken a dive somehow (not recalling) and split my bottom lip but, on what??? getting up latter in which you worried, i checked the floor - no blood. i checked the doors (as if i might have passed out and hit one head on) - nothing. i checked my gums and my mouth but noticed my lips were not lacerated - not cut - and the injury didn't look like a hit to the mouth.
rather - it looked like it had been "burned" inside my gums. it is healing now but - a point to ponder.


exactly what i saw.
secondly, (no there are no woman except you). my neighbor came up this morning to ask how i was feeling and if i need anything - give a call. meanwhile she asked if i had chicken?? (that's all she seems to eat) she's having
guests and running a bit low.
while i was getting her supplies, chicken - asked her if she had seen anything unusual on sunday evening? she said, "no but had to close her shades/blinds because the whole area was lit up and she didn't know why". just annoying.  (oh well)

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: I have images of exactly what i saw

content.detailedDescription: I was examining the curiosity rovers website looking at the geology and geography of the images and i noticed in one of the images that it appeared that here was a person walking across the plain. the image had to be enlarged several hundred times, but it is very evident that his is not an illusion. the being is clearly visible and you even see the trail in the sand behind him where he walked and he casts a shadow on the ground just in front of him. this is a valid image and you can clearly see the beings legs, torso, head and body. the image is available to anyone to examine and is very unexplainable. the image is the panoramic view from the rocknest on mars.
content.summary: Being seen on mars in curiosity images

content.detailedDescription: My family had a gathering at my mom's and we were looking at the flagpole that my sister had recently painted when i noticed something in the sky. it caught my attention when i noticed that the object didn't appear to have wings. i was looking at what seemed to be a huge white pipe flying higher and faster than a commercial jet. i asked my brother in law if he seen it. he said yes. i asked if he saw wings. he said no. i later found out that my mom said that she has been seeing them for a couple of years now. i would like to find out what this was.
content.summary: I saw a white tubular craft flying at a high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: My friend took pic...
content.summary: Took pic and saw that..

content.detailedDescription: It was about 4:30am on january 1st (new years) i had just got back to my mates house standing on his door-step smoking a cigerette when i had noticed what looked like an airplane 'towing' another airplane in the sky and quickly realised its not possible. the object was coming directly towards me and my mate, it turned right going across the sky from left to right and i noticed what it actually was, it was a rectangular shape with a bright white light on either of the bottom 2 corners and red lights flickering from left to right across it. it moved in a wierd way, while travelling from left to right it was ascending above the tree line/houses, in one quick move it changed from left-right to right-left whithout rotating or any other sign of movement still ascending but very slowly. at this time i went running down the street with my phone camera out but the street lamps were too bright for my camera to see it, after changing direction from left-right to right-left 3 times the ufo was out of my sight behind the houses. since that morning no one has believed our story saying we were hallucinating, i know to this day what i saw that morning was a ufo and i will until the day i die. it still blows my mind.
content.summary: The ufo moved in a wierd way, travelling from left to right and right to left while gradually ascending.

content.detailedDescription:
I'm frequently exploring the planet via the google satellite maps, and there are tons of strange (unexplained) items showing up in their photographs.   i seem to have a gift for finding these things.  this is my first time reporting any of my findings.
 
attached is one of my latest discoveries (i don't know if anyone else in the world has noticed or reported this specific item yet).    
 
i'm attaching a pdf file containing a 6-page, step-by-step presentation of images furnished in the google maps, documenting what i've found.

nicap-required information:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
exploring photos of planet earth via google maps

2. what made you first notice the object?
objects in photo appear to be unusual phenomena

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
something unusual and unexplained

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
seems spherical and emanating something that perturbs the surrounding air

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
wanted to report to an agency for follow-up investigation

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
object is only seen in a single google maps street-level photo
content.summary: The 3 objects appear in google maps street-level photograph

content.detailedDescription: 4 of us witnessed 4 ufos hovering/flying over dearborn mi at around 9 pm on sept. 3 2013.  one after another they seem to ascend out of this earth..Their lights seemed to become smaller and smaller until their lights faded away( this happened pretty quickly-  within seconds)  the ufos looked like a red orange-ish color (like the fireball description). after a minute, we start seeing this pulsating bright white light(every second or two) (seemed to be about satellite distance) but it seemed to be moving because it was not stationery.  after a minute or two we start seeing 2 crafts (probably stealth planes) with green and red flashing lights on each craft flying at a really high altitude around the same area were the 4 ufo and 1 bright pulsating lights were. i captured this with a photo and video.  video is too large to submit.+
content.summary: 4 ufos hovering and then ascended out of sight, 1 ufo  bright pulsating white light every 1-2 seconds - seemed really far (maybe satellite distance)

content.detailedDescription: Enjoying the evening sky and noticed a large star above the distant treetops. it moved in a straight path parallel to the treetops and stopped (an index finger length when held up to the sky). minutes later is quickly ascended straight up (a thumbs length)and a couple seconds later descended straight down to its original position. it was stationary for minutes. then it moved in a straight path parallel to the treetops heading south. i'm thinking this is weird and surely the planes i can see going by can see this thing. the white light was very large and almost blinding through binoculars. i had the impression that there was movement, whirring lights within the major brightness and there was pulsating colors but the white light was so bright it was hard to tell the movement. it moved south and higher in the sky and once again stationary. at the same time another one more distant, staying in the lower ne area of sky, was moving around every direction. then the clouds moved in. it gave one a strange feeling and i thought if it was a ufo type thing-it just better not come my way.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright star-like: traveled, hovered, shot up and down, hovered, traveled, hovered

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my front patio having coffee i looked to the right and up in the sky was a big bright light.I thought wow that's really bright is it a plane watched for it to move but it didn't then i thought its not a star way to big and bright and it just sat still in the sky.Then the light started to fade away the object moved up a bit stopped the lights faded and it was gone.It was so bright i couldn't make out a shape it was almost hard to focus on because it was that bright.
content.summary: Was stationary then bright light faded and dissappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Nearly every day i walk around my 3.5 acre lake to view the spring fish hatch. my lake is 200 feet from my front door. i found on a tuesday morning a mutilated fish twenty feet off the shoreline on the grass. assuming it was a predator, i threw the fish in the woods to be finished off by other small predators.

two days later, the exact same occurrence took place. this is an event i have never seen since the lakes were constructed in 1972. so i took a close look at this fish, (a largemouth bass) and found parts of the fish missing. eyes, internal organs, anal area and a very strange 5/8" (inch) perfectly round hole near the spinal area. no blood was present. having heard in the past that a hole of this caliber is common to mutilated animal cases. i handled the fish with surgical gloves, photographed the fish from many angles and then froze it.

i then called linda moulton howe who as you may know has been investigating cases of mutilation for more than thirty years.  she was immediately interested because this was the first fish mutilation case she had heard about. she gave me some instructions on how to start this investigation. i've been on it for several years without success. i have been unable to find a scientist, biologist or someone with forensic credentials to be willing to attach their names to the findings of this investigation.

so, i ask your organization for help in this mystifying event.

i have sent photos to one of your investigators.

thank you
content.summary: Found 2 mutilated fish, first to be known, definitely not by predators.

content.detailedDescription:
near columbia station in lorain county, ohio 8 or more people noticed a bright intense orange yellow light stationary at 15 deg elevation at exactly 10pm edt, i asked several people what time their watches showed. it occurred on a saturday in august, maybe the 17th.  at an outdoor party while sitting around a very large bonfire out of the due east an orange intense light was noticed.  i had consumed no intoxicants, alcohol or other, as my body reacts to alcohol causing joint pain.
     one lady said - look at that light, it is hovering there.  we all watched same for about 1 - 2 minutes at which time it seemed to wink out in a short time.  we all conversed about it's shape wondering what it was.  it seemed that some observers thought something like a short line was was hanging from the bottom of the object.
     the expressed emotions were of wonder and puzzlement.
content.summary: Very intense orange light in shape of point down cone. hovered, one jerky move then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on my patio photographing the stars and constellations with my dslr and telephoto lens (with it zoomed out completely - this is a canon eos m camera using a ef 75-300mm f/4-5.6 iii usm lens).  at the time i was zoomed out as far as the lens allows, so for example, i could only fit two of the major stars in a constellation within the frame at a time. therefore this is a pretty small area of the sky (in twenty to thirty seconds the object traveled about the distance in the sky of half the length of a dollar bill if held up in front of your face).  i verified through skywatch that this was not a satellite.  i know that the two weather balloon launches that happen in vegas daily are in a completely different direction and besides, this traveled from side to side.  it was also not a meteor as it had no tail and clearly had its own power, in addition it faded both into sight and out of sight.

i noticed the object as it faded into visibility close to the area i was currently photographing.  it started a pale blue green and quickly became bright white as it moved from east to west.  its speed varied somewhat, it seemed to speed up as it became bright.  i've seen a number of these objects before so i knew right away that it wasn't anything normal.

as the object moved across the small area when it was visible, it began to fade back out of visibility from white to a pale orange and then was gone.

i was unable to capture when it became visible as i was rushing to get the camera adjusted to the proper position.  once i had it in the frame, i began shooting.  within twenty seconds it was gone.  

the object had no blinking lights like a plane.  the night was clear without any cloud cover.  it was 4:44 am on thursday, august 28th, 2013.  i verified via archived climate data that there was no wind at the time of my sighting.

the images i have attached have been modified as such:
- adjusted brightness and contrast slightly so that the stars and ufo are more easily visible against the background
- added a yellow circle around the object to help show where it is located
- decreased quality of the image to 95% when saving to lower the image size below 10 mb each
content.summary: White steady light (starlike in size) appeared & moved west 25 seconds then faded out

content.detailedDescription: In my house in bed, a roar like a blast furnice moving over the house seeming like it was low in altitude, my first thought was a train, but as i listened more, i knew it was not a train. i could hear the sound moving from w. or n.W. to e. to e.S.. i felt excited, eager to see what it was i rushed to the front door to see, but6 it was gone before i got there. i have worked around blast furnice's and i know that sound. have'nt heard it since two nites after.
content.summary: Was laying in bed when i heard a roar like a blast furnice moving over the house, i got up to see what it was but it was gone, this happened again the second nite after

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
My friends and i saw what looked like a faint light circling almost directly above us in the clouds on august 30th. i stayed on the same path for at least an hour and a half before we went inside for the evening. it was about 9:30 at night hen we first noticed the light which was long and thin but dull. about twenty minutes later, i noticed four lights just south of the one circling light converge in the center then separate about 20 feet each in four different direction and then converge at a center then spread out again. this also repeated over and over while the single cylindrical light kept circling on its path. they all were still visible until we went inside at about 11:00 that night.

august 31st the lights were there again, but there was less cloud coverage. the lights still in the same locations, the one still circled while the other four converged then spread out, however, anytime the lights moved from the clouds, they could not be seen again until they were either over or under (i'm not sure which) the clouds. the light appeared to only visible through the clouds. again they remained in the sky throughout the duration my friends and i were outside. 

on both nights helicopters flew near or close by the lights. these lights were seen in the  los angeles sky. 

my friends and i thought it was a ufo and i thought it could also be a military object or something.

we tried to locate the source for where the lights might have originated, but we couldn't determine any origination.
content.summary: Faint light circling, converging then separating in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside by the porch looking up towards the tree 

at the opposite side of my house, when i saw the bunch 

of light (like round) hovering over the tree.  calling 

my wife and pointing at it to her saying it is the same 

ligh,  me calling it a ufo, my wife contradicts it by 

saying that it is a helicopter.  told her to listen hard 

if she could hear a sound and she left and went back in 

the house.

calling her back out to the porch again,  told her to 

look up and told her that the ufo has moved. went down 

the road to follow the ufo and told her to get the 

camera and bring it to me.  

i took two pics of the object which i call ufo.  my 

wife's reaction was complete surprise when she saw it 

hovering again over our friends house by the trees.  we 

stayed a little longer watching then went home coz it just disappeared quickly before our eyes..

that night was a moonless and not much stars on the sky.
content.summary: One big light with tiny lights round it with glowing light outwards

content.detailedDescription:
My wife was on our front porch (deck) and happened to look up and saw 6-9 very bright yellow-orange lights.  some moving quickly back and forth, some hovering.
she ran in yelling for everyone to come out and see this.  at first we were shocked, but we all ran out (myself, daughter and friend with my wife) and we all stood in shock.  some of the lights had a v shape some round, the they merged into two or three and zipped behind a cloud, then two came out.
she called for her sister, who lives close by to look up and she saw two ufo's, just as what we were seeing at that moment.  
my wife only then thought to take a cell phone picture, but couldn't get it as she was nervous and fidgety, and soon they just disappeared, we think behind a small cloud formation, but we are not sure.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 6-8 v shaped bright orange melded into 2-4 then looked spherical hoovered high above our home

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were walking home through a park. we discovered an elaborate fractal chalk pattern in the parking lot behind south suburban ice rink in centennial colorado. the chalk markings were spiral fractal, about fifteen feet in diameter. another chalk picture ten feet away showed the infinity sign with two x in the center of the loops. i received an image of the fractal structure of spacetime and a conceptual understanding of where the spacetime transcription events occur. a few seconds later i looked up and pointed at the sky, having seen a seven light chevron shape, like a goose migrational pattern flying slowly and lowly overhead. there was no associated aircraft noise, totally silent. the craft was headed east along arapahoe road, then very suddenly accelerated upwards, i could see the shape of the lights in tight formation warp to suggest the craft was flying parallel to the ground, then angled up nearly 80 degrees and ascended. my friend also saw it. we did not discuss what we had seen right away, however his description matched exactly whay i had seen when i asked him
content.summary: Flying seven light chevron, slow eastbound flight, sudden altitude gain over centennial. fractal chalk markings discovered outlining spacetime replication event.

content.detailedDescription:
While we were walking west in south london, my husband stood behind me and put his hands on my shoulders. i thought he was trying to stop me from running into a skunk which have been plentiful in the city this summer. instead he pointed to the s/w area of the sky about 25 degrees or so up from the horizon. there was an unusual light in the sky. my husband said it caught his attention because it was so bright and the colour was such a bright shade of red- both characteristics together seemed strange to him. 
it was moving horizontally from right to left, sw to w, across the southern sky. at first i thought it was a jet plane with its red landing lights flickering as they sometimes do. but the light was flickering and pulsating not just flickering/blinking. 
the light seemed to be under intelligent control. it was a very controlled movement, not like one that was natural, i.E. movement due to wind. 

it seemed to be moving at the same rate of speed as a jet plane at some distance. have no idea how big the light source was or how fast it was going. the light changed colour from red to orange. i don't think plane lights change colour. it also faded in intensity plus it was flickering and pulsating. then the light brightened up again and then changed colour, again, this time to bright blood red. then the light changed colour from bright blood red to bright purple or violet. 

at that point, i said no, that's not right. planes are never a bright, reddish-purple-violet, flickering, pulsating light... 
then the light changed colour again back to orange red and was flickering in and out of view. then it did a slow u turn to travel back in the same direction it had come. at this point we lost sight of it as it went behind some trees. in all the sighting lasted only about 30 to 40 seconds. 
i don't know what to think. it didn't look like a plane. i've really only seen flares on video. i don't know if flares can travel across the sky and change direction. 
unfortunately we did not have our cell phone with us but i don't know what would have been captured on camera even if we'd tried. we were too busy watching this light intently as it kept changing colours and the length of the duration of the sighting was pretty short. 
i don't know what to think. strangest thing i think i've ever witnessed as an mysterious light in the sky.
content.summary: Mysterious light in sw sky travelling from right to left

content.detailedDescription:
One warm evening two nurses and i were getting off the evening shift about 2300 to 2330 and going out the rear doors into the parking lot.    i looked up and saw a disc like object cruising towards us in the sky.   there was a band of either pulsating or flashing lights around the middle.  the object made no noise but continued steadily right over our heads, right over the top of the hospital and out of sight.  i said to my companions "what is that?"   they answered "an airplane".  i replied "thats not like ant airplane i ever saw".

the next day newspaper had a front page article about "an object over hampton roads. this was seen in cheasapeake, suffolk, virginia beach, norfolk and other neighboring areas.   i brought the paper to work the next evening, plunked it down in front of the two co- workers and said "now what do you think that was?"    the reply?   "an airplane",

i have tried to search the papers and have found nothing perusing to this incident.   it took place in the mod to late 80s.   if you find the article in the paper, please send me a copy.  i will pay expenses.    [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Circular disc with a band of lights around the middle

content.detailedDescription: We were talking about the reason for the widespread cell service outage in north texas today smoking a cigarette in the parking lot watch air traffic when this thing came over head, it made no sound and was gone almost as soon as we noticed it. it was suggested it might be birds but they would have had to be some really big birds in a very tight formation to look like a solid object. the way it moved as odd, it was very smooth motion and completely silent. we tried to follow it on foot and then it was just gone.
content.summary: Very organic looking but not birds

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were sitting in front of our fire pit in front of our lake house around 10 pm when i happened to look up and saw an orange glowing orb about the size of a bright star or planet moving across the sky. i could not tell how high it was .I thought it might be a plane but there was no sound and no flashing lights you customarily see with them. i went down on my dock on the lake and lost sight of it. it had been moving fairly slowly in a southeast to northwest direction. about 5 to 10 minutes later an identical (or the same one) orb went across my camp heading in the exact same direction. my son saw it this time and we both went out on the dock. the weather was partly overcast with visible stars. the second  orb went across the sky and changed direction. at this time we also observed a third orb again coming in the same direction as the first two and we could view them both at the same time. they appeared to change direction and disappear into the clouds. the entire event from first sighting to last was about 15 minutes i would estimate. i have never seen a  plane do that or have multiple lights go across the sky following one another with no sound. it was definitely not a meteor or satellite with the slow movement. my son and i were quite mystified and wondered if others in the area had seen the lights.  i read on line about similar sightings of similar object traveling in groups in the same direction from around the world at various times.
content.summary: My son and i observed three orange silent  orbs traveling slowly one after another from se to nw d

content.detailedDescription: I was hanging out with friends, six of us in total. we were discussing religion & i just happened to look up & i seen a brownish-orange, cigar-shaped ufo with windows on the side of it. you can see light inside the object & it gave off a funny haze/glow that was a neon green in color. the object wasving in a straight path but was panning left to right like a dial on a meter. it had no faa lights. i was surprised & confused at the same time. all 6 of us lost sight of the object when it passed over a building. when i first saw it i thought it was a blimp as well as the others. we realized that no blimps fly that high & blimps make a humming noise. this object was silent. its glow was also something that made all of us think it wasn't a blimp. i have spoken to lillian waters about this sighting in the kgra chat room & was encouraged to file this report.
content.summary: Weird, ominous & surprising.

content.detailedDescription: My and my father where on a walk, when we saw a lot of planes. but we coudnt hear them, their had to be 50+; and we only have a small commercial airport. then i saw what i though was a planet, rapidly loose size, until a smaller object (purplish) shot out. another one circled over me and my father, for about two minutes. i felt bizarre, and nervous. both me and my father left are phones at home. it was hard to look at the object, like a black circe was covering it.
content.summary: Circles with light orbiting my area. fireball

content.detailedDescription:
my wife and i were sitting on our porch in late afternoon. the weather was clear and the sky was blue. i noticed in front of me to my right(southerly) what looked like 4 parachutes moving slowly in a north easterly direction. looking closer i saw that they were not parachutes but round white orbs. i took 2 photos (852 & 853). the dark area  on top is the roof of our porch. my wife then told me to look left and there were a bunch more of them (pic 854). that's when i went down to the driveway to get a clearer view of the sky. i took several more pics from here.
    this took place at 5:52pm local time. the camera timestamp is 6 hours behind as i did not adjust it for local time. img858 shows what looks like a dark cylinder amongst the orbs. it also appears in img860. the orbs were not moving much, not intermingling or anything like that. in fact they seemed to keep a relative position from each other.
     when the 4 that were in front of me and initially got my attention, caught up to the others(roughly north east of me), that's when most movement stopped. at that point i counted 18 of them, there might have been more. they then started to slowly dim as though they were gaining altitude and eventually i could no longer see them. the whole event lasted about 8-10 minutes.
     in this area of the pre alps i have seen many para gliders and parachuters. this was definatley neither of those. as they gathered and started to dim i viewed them with an 8x binocular. they appeared brighter as though lighted. i've seen many strange things in this area but this one was right up there.

when i initially saw the first 4(pics 852 and 853) it was hard to estimate their altitude. i first thought they were paragliders which i have seen numerous times in this area. that would place them at about 500 - 2000 feet altitude. but not knowing the size of the objects, i can not say at what altitude they were.
content.summary: Multiple bright orbs during afternoon in clear sky

content.detailedDescription:
Cigar shaped one at 10 am in the morning saturday��� came from ne heading sw  1000���- 1,500��� high?    saw for 20 seconds then the starburst flash���.10 seconds then it went into a white fluffy cloud  (the cloud was say 100yds in diameter.)  bright and sunny temp 75degrees. 
js  f.I. 8/31/2013

same location:

this morning  9/3/12  5:30-6:00 am  counted at least 20 white ufo's thought that they may be patrolling.  grid  two crossed each other one going west to east the other going south to north.  5? were going west to east. 5? (at least) going from south to north.  10? came from north to south.
sun burst by 3 to 4 of them.  no 90 degree turns.  left to right sweeps.  all were white. 10 to 15,000 feet away.  not satalites.  
weather crystal clear milky way was north west to south east (not normal)
js  f.I. 9/3/2013
content.summary: Cigar shaped 20 seconds then starburst flash then after 10 sec dissapeared in cloud

content.detailedDescription: After midnight in the north highlands of scotland i went outside for last smoke and as usual i looked up as the  sky was clear spotting the plough and the north star. below the ploughs bottom left star point approximately half the distance between it and the one above it in the constilation  there was a flash i laughed inwardly and joked for it to flash again ,it did about 8 seconds later... it never did again as i watched. i have been confused regarding this incident and wondered if there could have been a neuclear explosion or a star explosion in outer space i have not looked into any possibilities of any sightings at that time . it was not a plane as the distance away was vast. the second flash was in the same position as the first was and i have no idea what could have produced these star like flashes.
content.summary: Two flashes 8 seconds apart in space below the plough big dipper. in space far away

content.detailedDescription: Last week my dad texted me while on his walk to pick him up from a place he doesn't normally go.  i answered it too late after he told me he was chasing a ufo.  it sounded like one i had seen a while back and my friend had seen in the same area.  last night it came back.  he went on his walk and hurried back and told me and my mom it was outside again.  we grabbed some binoculars and went tot he street corner and watched it.  it was a long way off, but it was a red orb that pulsed white once and again.  it kept going below then above the tree line in the same place but not moving much.  this time my dad and i went after it.  my mom stayed home.  i drove us out to a field in a more rural part of the area with few lights.  he didn't expect to see much, but we both got more than we thought we would.  we spotted it once on the main road, still far off but in the same spot.  we observed it for about 5 minutes then things got strange.  it was a perfectly clear night with no cloud cover.  we could see multiple planes in the sky too.  all of a sudden, 8 white orbs appeared below the red one.  they pulsated brightly, always white.  much brighter than the stars.  they proceeded to form a straight line in the sky for about 3 minutes.  next they moved to form a triangular pattern.  they seemed to be getting closer and closer to us.  at this point we high tailed it out of there.  this seems to be a recurring theme in this area.  my dad was a skeptic until last night.  there was also no noise at all from the lights.  they moved under intelligent control.  having lived the last 4 years near a major air force base i know they were totally unlike anything i have seen down there.  i plan to have some of my friends bring nice cameras and we are going to try to hunt them down tomorrow night.  by far the strangest thing that has ever happened to me.
content.summary: Solitary red orb at first then fleet of white orbs that moved in patterns
